content:
Daivatthepettoru maathaavaam
Mariyaamettam vaazhvettoll
Daivikakunyaadineyaashcharyam
Thanmadiyil thaalolichaall
/tghoraagniprabhayum theekshna
/tjvaalayumeshaayvaaneeshan
/tveeryatthaalavalle thaangi
Krobedootharathhatthinme-
Lereedunnoneyettaall.

Athbhuthamaam phalamekum vrksham
Karkkashamaam shila, meenevam
Paashandarkkethire drshdaantam
Moonnennam sabha kaattunnu
/tkunyaadine vrksham nalki
/ttheekkalpaara jalam nalki
/testheeraa mathsyavumeki
Kanyaakshepakare moonnum
Parihaasatthodu veekshippoo.

Dhanye! Nin praarththhanamevatte nyangallodonni-
Charththhana kettittekeedatte punyam naathhan

Entaunnathyam bhaumikaputhrikkundaayennu
Chonneedum nyaan sambhramaarnnittalbhuthapoorvvam
Thrkkaarunyam suthane thaazhtthi savidhe chertthu
Daivasuthan than maathaavaakaan thiruhithamaarnnaall

Saumyarilallaathengamarum nyaanennuracheython
Jaatharilettam thaazhtthappettullllavallil paartthaan
Aarumuyartthappettillithupolathinaal spashdam
Mariyaameppolaarum thaazhtthappettittilla.

Ompathumaasam ninneyettoll thal praarththhanayaal
Daivaathmajane! Kopatthin dandozhivaakkenam
